mapper.select: SELECT tproj.proj_id, tproj.proj_name, tc.client_name, tproj.start_date, tproj.end_date, (select count(*) from tbl_user_project as tup where tup.proj_id = tproj.proj_id) as members, ps.proj_status_name FROM tbl_project_mst AS tproj inner join tbl_proj_info as tpi on tproj.proj_id = tpi.proj_id left join tbl_clients_mst as tc on tpi.client_id = tc.client_id left join tbl_proj_status_mst as ps on tpi.proj_status_id = ps.proj_status_id WHERE tproj.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY tproj.proj_id DESC, tproj.reg_date DESC;
SELECT proj_id, proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, del_flag FROM tbl_project_mst WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY proj_id DESC, reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_project_mst( proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{proj_name}, #{proj_code}, #{proj_description}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, 1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_project_mst SET proj_name=#{project.proj_name}, proj_code=#{project.proj_code}, proj_description=#{project.proj_description}, start_date=#{project.start_date}, end_date=#{project.end_date}, update_id = 1 WHERE proj_id = #{id}
